data: I was on my way from San Francisco to Yokohama, when in a very desultory and gradual manner I became acquainted with Mrs. Lecks and Mrs. Aleshine.
The casting away of Mrs. Lecks and Mrs. Aleshine
Stockton, Frank R., 1834-1902; Steele, Frederic Dorr, 1873-1944 [Illustrator]
